channel.title: Rails Network FAQ
channel.description: Recent content on Rails Network FAQ

item.title: How to Buy SteamX
item.description: Guide to Buying SteamX using MetaMask and our Bridge # Step 1: Install MetaMask # You need a wallet. We recommend MetaMask for seamless integration with our network. Install it from a trusted source. Visit their website for legitimate download links: metamask.io If you are using TrustWallet, you can import your Seed-Phrase into MetaMask and use it at the same time. Please follow this guide on How to Import TrustWallet into MetaMask.

item.title: Bridge USDC from Ethereum to Rails
item.description: Bridge USDC from Ethereum to Rails # This guide walks you through the process of bridging USDC between the Ethereum and Rails networks using our depot. Requirements: # Ensure you have the following assets in the Ethereum network wallet you want to bridge with: About 10 to 20 USD in ETH for covering gas fees. The amount of USDC you want to bridge. Important Notes: # Use a compatible wallet like MetaMask.

item.title: Bridge USDC from Rails to Ethereum
item.description: Bridge USDC from Rails to Ethereum # This guide walks you through the process of bridging USDC between the Rails and Ethereum networks using our depot. Requirements: # Ensure you have the following assets in the Ethereum network wallet you want to bridge with: About 10 to 20 USD in ETH for covering gas fees. The amount of USDC you want to bridge. Important Notes: # Use a compatible wallet like MetaMask.
